languages.text: "Да уж, правду говорят, что даже высокое положение не спасет от Имперского правосудия, если у тебя ересь в душе..."
"Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."
languages.original_text: "Да уж, правду говорят, что даже высокое положение не спасет от Имперского правосудия, если у тебя ересь в душе..."

traits.locale_text: "Looks like what they say is really true then, not even high status can save you from Imperial justice if you hold heresy in your soul..."
"Looks like what they say is really true then, not even high status can save you from Imperial justice if you hold heresy in your soul..."
"Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."
"Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."
"Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."

languages.text: “看来他们说的是真的，哪怕是再位高权重的异端分子，也必将遭受帝国的审判……”
languages.original_text: "Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."

traits.locale_text: “看来他们说的是真的，哪怕是再位高权重的异端分子，也必将遭受帝国的审判……”

languages.text: « C'était donc bien vrai : aucun hérétique ne peut échapper à la justice impériale, pas même ceux de haut rang... »
languages.original_text: "Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."

traits.locale_text: « C'était donc bien vrai : aucun hérétique ne peut échapper à la justice impériale, pas même ceux de haut rang... »

languages.text: 「ならどうやら皆が言ってることは本当のようだな。どんな地位にあろうと、異端者は帝国の裁きから逃れられない…」
languages.original_text: "Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."

traits.locale_text: 「ならどうやら皆が言ってることは本当のようだな。どんな地位にあろうと、異端者は帝国の裁きから逃れられない…」

languages.text: «Pues es cierto lo que dicen... ni siquiera el estatus puede salvar a un hereje de la justicia del Imperium...».
languages.original_text: "Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."

traits.locale_text: «Pues es cierto lo que dicen... ni siquiera el estatus puede salvar a un hereje de la justicia del Imperium...».

languages.text: "Dann stimmt es wohl, was man so hört — nicht einmal ein hoher Status kann einen Ketzer vor der imperialen Gerechtigkeit retten ..."
languages.original_text: "Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."

traits.locale_text: "Dann stimmt es wohl, was man so hört — nicht einmal ein hoher Status kann einen Ketzer vor der imperialen Gerechtigkeit retten ..."

languages.text: "Söylenenler gerçekten de doğruymuş. Statü bile bir kâfiri İmparatorluk'un adaletinden koruyamazmış..."
languages.original_text: "Looks like what they say is really true then — not even status can save a heretic from Imperial justice..."
